verbose_text: Autophagy is recognized as a crucial cell survival pathway that enables tumor cells to overcome stressors in the tumor microenvironment as well as injuries caused by treatments such as endocrine therapy, chemotherapy, and radiation therapy XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR.
evidence: cell survival pathway that enables tumor cells to overcome stressors in the tumor microenvironment
